cs_pitch Struct Reference

#include <MuNote.h>

Public Attributes

short octave
 octave defines an octave index, with the central octave (middle-C) octave set to 8
short pitch
 pitch is a pitch class integer between 0 and 11

Detailed Description

Pitch information in Csound format.

This structure defines the pitch for a given note by separating pitch-class and octave content. It is used to help MuM deal with Csound score information (reading and writing) and to make internal calculations in which this separation is necessary.

Warning:
The fields contained in this structure are meant for use in Csound and their values should not exceed documented limitations to avoid undesired musical output.
